name: iWalk - Long Sleeve Tee -Charcoal with pink designs!
description:
I walk to improve my health. I walk to lose weight. I walk to spend time with a good friend or family member. I walk to get from here to there. Whatever the reason, iWalk. Let people know your passion for walking by sporting this 6.0 oz 100% cotton tubular jersey tee. 

This tag-less, unisex  long sleeve tee features the iWalk design on the front and the iLive logo on the back in Pink. Your shirt will also include one 4x6 all weather, vinyl oval decal of the iLive logo to proudly show off on your vehicle window, or anywhere you choose.

Your life. Be proud.

name: Long Sleeve Tee - Charcoal
description:
Just in time for the colder months are our 6.0 oz 100% cotton tubular jersey tees. They have a comfortably soft and quality feel to them and are available with ANY of our designs on the front. They also feature a tag-less label for ultimate comfort, along with our logo on the back. 

We will respond to your order right away so you may request your design.

Your life. Be proud.
